name: Brotherhood of the Fire Fist - Wolf
desc: If this card is flipped face-up: You can Set 1 "Fire Formation" Trap Card directly from your Deck, then, if this card was Flip Summoned, you can also Set 1 "Fire Formation" Spell Card directly from your Deck.
str2: Set 1 "Fire Formation" Spell Card directly from your Deck?

ocg.rarity: Brotherhood of the Fire Fist - Wolf

tcg.rarity: Brotherhood of the Fire Fist - Wolf
